    • addSensor

      public boolean addSensor​(edu.ma02.core.interfaces.ISensor is) throws edu.ma02.core.exceptions.StationException, edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException
      Adds a new sensor to the station
      Specified by:
      addSensor in interface edu.ma02.core.interfaces.IStation
      Parameters:
      is - The sensor instance to be inserted
      Returns:
      true if the sensor was inserted in the collection storing all sensors otherwise false
      Throws:
      edu.ma02.core.exceptions.StationException - if the @param sensor is null
      edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException - if the sensorId is invalid

    • addMeasurement

      public boolean addMeasurement​(java.lang.String string, double d, java.time.LocalDateTime ldt, java.lang.String string1) throws edu.ma02.core.exceptions.StationException, edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException, edu.ma02.core.exceptions.MeasurementException
      Adds a new measurement to a sensor
      Specified by:
      addMeasurement in interface edu.ma02.core.interfaces.IStation
      Parameters:
      string - The sensor ID
      d - The measurement value
      ldt - The measurement date
      string1 - The measurement unit
      Returns:
      true if the measurement was inserted in the collection storing all sensors otherwise false
      Throws:
      edu.ma02.core.exceptions.StationException - If the sensor doesn't exists or any parameter is null
      edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException - if the @param unit is not compatible with the unit pre-defined for the sensor
      edu.ma02.core.exceptions.MeasurementException - uncatched from measurement if the value is -99
